Megaton went through the usual questions in his head, the first three had
been asked, who he was, where he came from, and what does he want. the forth
question was asked by Hot Rod, predictable but a question that only fools
wouldn't ask.

"I have a sense of logic that is equaled by no one, As I've said, it is in
my factions best interest to work with you." He said matter of factly,
"Besides, I'm not fully Predacon." He added trying to add a little
reassurance.

Depth Charge added his two cents(I'm not moding, I'm copy and pasteing his
exact words) "yeah right like I would turn my back on you. who was it who
said you would not like if I showed up here with a group of preds? well I
got one for you. How about I rip out your spark and show it to you."

"Words can be the cause of many conflicts Depth Charge.  Especially
misquoted words." He crossed his arms trying to hide his irritation. "I said
that , "If a single bot such as myself walked up to your front door imagine
what a GROUP with a dozen warriors could do." (Again the quote is copy and
pasted from the post.)

----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2001 4:50 PM
Subject: Re: Megaton at the CF


> ::Hot Rod::
>
> He stood in front of Megaton.
> "How do we know you are being honest? Lets face it, Predacons,
> Decepticons, Destrons or otherwise dont have a reputation for keeping
> their word."
>
